text: But back, Mr. Hammarskjold is determined, they must go. The best news for the Congo would be agreement between its rival political leaders. Through the patient efforts of UN conciliators they are meeting for the first time, in Malagasy (formerly Madagascar). THE world will sigh with relief when this strife-torn land gets itself a government which all outsiders can recognise.
